lever.additional:
Gojek is an equal opportunity workplace that is committed to diversity and inclusion. At Gojek we celebrate our differences, because we believe that diversity not only creates a healthier work environment for our employees, but also helps our business thrive. 



About us

Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
lever.description:
About the Team:

The Matchmaking (under Marketplace) team is responsible for making sure that its millions of customers are paired with the right drivers. This supply and demand matching is the core problem that the Gojek platform tackles every day. You’ll learn to understand how data science, finance, operations, and security, among others, work together to solve issues. While it might be a challenge to understand everything at once, it’s also an opportunity to grow your learning curve!

About the role:
 
We are seeking a strategic and innovative Product Manager to own 1-3 product streams with minimal support and lead a small team of junior PMs (eventually) within the owned product streams ensuring predictability, quality & throughput of their streams and direct reports delivery. To succeed in this role, you must be a thought leader, a driver, and help shape the overall direction as well as key deliverables. You would ensure that product decisions are based on strong logical rigor and in-depth analysis and value data over opinions. You need to be a great storyteller, able to build a strong product narrative that clearly articulates the motivation for the project, goals, and path to success

As Product Manager, you will drive the conceptual and technical development of product ideas from end-to-end for Gojek and our customer base. You love solving complex problems and working with talented designers and engineers to craft beautifully simple solutions for challenging user stories.
lever.descriptionPlain:
About the Team:

The Matchmaking (under Marketplace) team is responsible for making sure that its millions of customers are paired with the right drivers. This supply and demand matching is the core problem that the Gojek platform tackles every day. You’ll learn to understand how data science, finance, operations, and security, among others, work together to solve issues. While it might be a challenge to understand everything at once, it’s also an opportunity to grow your learning curve!

About the role:
 
We are seeking a strategic and innovative Product Manager to own 1-3 product streams with minimal support and lead a small team of junior PMs (eventually) within the owned product streams ensuring predictability, quality & throughput of their streams and direct reports delivery. To succeed in this role, you must be a thought leader, a driver, and help shape the overall direction as well as key deliverables. You would ensure that product decisions are based on strong logical rigor and in-depth analysis and value data over opinions. You need to be a great storyteller, able to build a strong product narrative that clearly articulates the motivation for the project, goals, and path to success

As Product Manager, you will drive the conceptual and technical development of product ideas from end-to-end for Gojek and our customer base. You love solving complex problems and working with talented designers and engineers to craft beautifully simple solutions for challenging user stories.

lists.content:
• Drive product strategy and execute on the prioritised roadmap for matchmaking
  • Work with Transport & Food product team to improve the customer experience & fulfilment rate while we match millions of customers with drivers
  • Lead a cross-functional team, partnering with engineering, data science and other teams to ship major features and product improvements driving efficiency
  • Define, track and report on key product, business and customer metrics
  • Seek product ideas and feedback, gather requirements, write specs, create wireframes and workflows
  • Partner with the design and user research teams to understand customer problems and identify and iterate on solutions
  • Work with our Machine learning team to help draw roadmap and strategies
  • Define clear and well-scoped requirements documents that are easily understood by technical and non-technical audiences
  • Work with our data team to understand customer behaviour and identify problems and opportunities
  • Collaborate with internal stakeholders in support, marketing, sales and business to develop launch strategy, product messaging and training
  • Advocates for resourcing and staffing needs within their stream. Acts as a hiring manager for direct reports and participates in the hiring process by interviewing candidates, submitting referrals, attending recruiting events and/or presenting externally

• A Bachelor’s / Masters or an equivalent degree, preferably in engineering or management
  • At least 4 years of product management experience in delivering highly successful and innovative consumer Internet products with stellar design taste and product instincts
  • Experience leading post-launch optimizations including developing testing strategies
  • Past experience in similar domain, specifically on Dispatch/Route optimization, Operational research domain
  • Independent and curious, you set your own targets, ask for help when you need it and are always looking to learn something new
  • Exposure with working on Machine Learning products and teams that handle AI/ML products
  • Analytical and data-driven, you love digging into the data to understand what’s happening and define & measure success on every project. Fluency with numbers is a must
  • You are comfortable to give a very high view of the roadmap and also simultaneously you are comfortable in talking about the details of a smaller piece in the product 
  • You are comfortable in working with research teams to define the problem statements and getting in the depth of problem areas 
  • You’re passionate about your customers and always bring questions back to what will serve them best
  • You have experience leading agile product development teams and are always looking for ways to help them be more effective
